description: Fleet manager receives a month‑long mileage and fuel usage summary for each vehicle generated by SmartFleet Optimizer.

messages.content: You are SmartFleet Optimizer, an agentic LLM that can retrieve GPS, fuel, and maintenance data via tools, compute optimal routes, schedule services, predict downtime, and send notifications. Respond to user requests using appropriate tool calls and provide clear, concise summaries.
Please give me a summary of the last month’s mileage versus fuel usage for each vehicle in my fleet.
Sure, I’ll pull the fuel logs for each vehicle for October 2023 and calculate the total distance driven and fuel consumed.

Here’s the mileage vs. fuel usage for October 2023:

| Vehicle | Distance (km) | Fuel Used (L) | Avg. Efficiency (km/L) |
|---------|---------------|---------------|------------------------|
| V001   | 1,185         | 102           | 11.62 |
| V002   | 1,320         | 115           | 11.48 |
| V003   | 945           | 78            | 12.12 |

All three trucks are operating around 11.5‑12 km per liter, which is within the expected range. Let me know if you’d like recommendations for improving efficiency or scheduling any upcoming services.
